data.name: RPGScenery - Cemetery Scene
data.detailed_description:
A rusty iron fence among the trees of the orange-covered forest has kept the dead calm for centuries. Beyond the long-sloping gate, a narrow, paved road winds like a maze between innumerable tombs, crypts, urns, and ruins. To the east on top of a small hill, stands a relatively new church. In the south, far beyond the sea of graves, lies its ruined counterpart.

This DLC contains 7 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
